```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(hexbin)
```

```{r}
ucsb_grad<- read.csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
ggplot(ucsb_grad)+
  geom_col(aes(x = year_abbr, 
               y = domestic_enrollment,
               fill = ethnicity), position = "fill")
  
```
